text: Deystvitel'no, angely, nakhodyas' pri smerti tekh, kotoryye sdelali zlo sebe samim, skazhut: "Kakovy byli vy?" Oni skazhut: "My byli slaby na zemle". - Te skazhut: "Ne prostranna li byla zemlya Bozhiya, chtoby nayti vam ubezhishche na ney?" Dlya takovykh zhilishchem budet geyenna (gorestnaya obitel')
